LanguageData.SleepingSpot.label: Спальный мешок
LanguageData.SleepingSpot.description: Designates a spot on the ground where people should sleep. Not comfortable. Rest effectiveness: 8/10
LanguageData.Bed.label: Кровать
LanguageData.Bed.description: A cozy mattress and sheets on a frame for resting. Rest effectiveness: 10/10
LanguageData.TableButcher.label: Стол мясника
LanguageData.TableButcher.description: A heavy table for butchering dead creatures into pieces of raw meat.
LanguageData.CookStove.label: Плита
LanguageData.CookStove.description: A simple stove and attached countertops for preparing meals from simpler ingredients.
LanguageData.TableStonecutter.label: Камнерезный стол
LanguageData.TableStonecutter.description: A work table equipped to cut rough stone into usable blocks.
LanguageData.HydroponicsBasin.label: Стол гидропоники
LanguageData.HydroponicsBasin.description: For growing food. Hydroponics basins grow a few plants quickly.
LanguageData.PlantPot.label: Горшок
LanguageData.ResearchBench.label: Исследовальский стол
LanguageData.ResearchBench.description: Researchers work here to discover new things.
LanguageData.EquipmentRack.label: Склад cнаряжения
LanguageData.EquipmentRack.description: Haulers carry equipment here for storage.
LanguageData.OrbitalTradeBeacon.label: Маяк
LanguageData.OrbitalTradeBeacon.description: Required for orbital trading. You can only sell goods that are near an orbital trade beacon and not under a roof. Orbital traders will also drop goods near this.
LanguageData.Chair.label: Стул
LanguageData.TableShort.label: Стол (мал.)
LanguageData.TableShort.description: People eat off tables when chairs are placed facing them.
LanguageData.TableLong.label: Стол (бол.)
LanguageData.TableLong.description: People eat off tables when chairs are placed facing them.
LanguageData.StandingLamp.label: Лампа
LanguageData.StandingLamp.description: Standing lamp that lights an area.
LanguageData.SunLamp.label: Солнечная лампа
LanguageData.SunLamp.description: Lights an area brightly enough to grow crops.
